column2: "Hey, <%me>. You came at just the right time."
"About that broken weapon you gave me... I looked into it, and it's just one piece of a whole."
"In other words, there should be more parts of it. My estimate is two more."
"I could extrapolate the rest and find replacement parts, but it wouldn't do this weapon justice."
"That's why I wanted to ask if you could find the remaining two pieces."
"It would mean a lot to me."
